sentences.sContent: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.sCn: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.sContent: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.sCn: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.sContent: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.sCn: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

words.tran: 不舒服的；无安慰的；不自由的
安慰者；圣灵；（美）被子；（英）羊毛围巾

trans.tranOther: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them
